<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.25
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>a06-15961_1ex10d25.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.25</font></p>

<h1 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="4" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FY 200__ MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE PLAN</font></b></h1>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Objective</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This FY 200__ Management
Incentive Plan (MIP) of AAR Corp. (the &#147;Company&#148;) is in effect over the period June&nbsp;1,
200__ to May&nbsp;31, 200__ (the &#147;Plan Year&#148;). It is intended to provide bonus
awards for the achievement of pre-tax income, return on invested capital and
cash flow goals as well as the personal performance of individual plan
participants.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Eligible Persons</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Eligible persons will only include those whose job
duties and responsibilities support classification as an &#147;exempt&#148; employee
under the Fair Labor Standards Act. In addition, persons whose primary
responsibility is selling directly to individual customers and prospects and as
a result, are provided with separate revenue or profit based incentive earnings
plans, are also not eligible for participation in the MIP. Otherwise,</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#183;</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Regular full-time persons in positions assigned
salary grade 25 or greater will automatically be eligible for participation,
and</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#183;</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Regular full-time persons in positions assigned
salary grades 22 to 24, inclusive, may selectively be granted eligibility
subsequent to the recommendation of a Vice President or other senior executive
directing the activities of the prospective participant&#146;s business unit or
functional organization.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Persons hired after March&nbsp;1, 200__ are not
eligible for participation in the FY 200__ MIP. Other new employees hired prior
to the March&nbsp;1 date may be granted eligibility for participation on a
pro-rata basis.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Eligibility for participation is subject to the final
approval of the President and CEO, AAR Corp., and the Corporate Vice President &#151;
Human Resources.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Definitions</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For MIP purposes,
the following terms will have the following meanings:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 84.6pt;text-indent:-48.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Base Salary</font></i> will mean the annualized base salary of a participant
on the last day of the Plan year &#151; that is, exclusive of any form of incentive
or lump sum payments and before any reduction for any voluntary contribution</p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\fc\1944407558_D10466_1220686\15961-2-km.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jul 13 04:40 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 86.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">authorized under any
qualified retirement plan sponsored by the Company or before any amount which a
participant may elect to defer under any other deferred compensation plan of
the Company.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 84.6pt;text-indent:-48.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Pre-Tax Income</font></i>  <i><font style="font-style:italic;">(PTI)</font></i> will mean
those pre-tax net income goals established annually for the Company and its
operating units, by the President and CEO in conjunction with the Compensation
Committee of the AAR Corp. Board of Directors.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 84.6pt;text-indent:-48.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Return on Invested Capital (ROIC)</font></i> will mean the percentage
which results from dividing operating profit over the FY by the average
invested capital over the FY.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 84.6pt;text-indent:-48.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Cash Flow (Cash) </font></i>will mean the target amount of Fiscal Year
End (FYE) cash and cash equivalents, established annually for the Company and
its operating units by the President and CEO, and reported in the Consolidated
Statements of Cash Flows of AAR CORP. and Subsidiaries.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 84.6pt;text-indent:-48.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Target Bonus (TB) </font></i>will mean the <u>percentage</u> of base
salary which may be earned by a participant upon full achievement of all
assigned quantitative and personal performance goals. A participant&#146;s TB
percentage is directly related to his or her salary grade and potential impact
on the overall performance of the Company.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 84.6pt;text-indent:-48.6pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">f)</font></i><i><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Nominal
Bonus (NB)</i> will mean the <u>amount</u> of incentive award derived from the
percentage of the TB which can be earned by a participant as a result of the
level of achievement measured against the participant&#146;s quantitative goals
(i.e., PTI and ROIC) and measured against the Company&#146;s FYE Cash Flow target.</p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Quantitative Measures</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each participant will have three quantitative goals
related to either the expectations for their operating unit or to the
expectations for the Company as a whole. In either case the goals will be
specific PTI and ROIC and Cash quantities.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As indicated in the table below, full (100.00% or
more) achievement of the PTI goal can provide up to 75.00% of a participant&#146;s
TB. Similarly, full achievement of the ROIC goal can provide up to 25.00% of a
participant&#146;s TB.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Conversely, anything less than 70.00% achievement of a
goal will eliminate the possibility of earning any portion of the participant&#146;s
TB which may be available for achievement measured against that goal.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\fc\1944407558_D10466_1220686\15961-2-km.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jul 13 04:40 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In between 70.00% and 100.00% (or more) the sequence
of <u>ranges</u> of performance achievement shown in the table will determine
the portion (%) of the participant&#146;s TB which can be credited for performance
against each goal. For example,</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#183;</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">between 70.00% and 74.99% performance achievement of
the PTI goal, the TB credit would be 37.50%.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#183;</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">between 95.00% and 99.99% performance achievement of
the ROIC goal, the TB credit would be 21.75.%.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The achievement credit (%)
earned against each of the PTI and ROIC measures is further modified by a
factor dependent upon the degree to which the Company achieves its annual Cash
Flow target as<i><font style="font-style:italic;"> follows:</font></i></font></h2>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.84%;">
  <p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Cash Flow Results</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="28%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:28.8%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.98%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.02%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="28%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:28.34%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">PTI&nbsp;&amp; ROIC Credit (%) Modifier
  Factor</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.02%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF">
  <td width="42%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:42.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">100.0% or More
  of Target Amount</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="54%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:54.38%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.0</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="42%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:42.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;90.0% to 99.9% of Target Amount</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="54%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:54.38%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.9</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF">
  <td width="42%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:42.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;80.0% to 89.9% of Target Amount</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="54%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:54.38%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.7</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">3</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\fc\1944407558_D10466_1220686\15961-2-km.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jul 13 04:40 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF">
  <td width="42%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:42.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">70.0% to 79.9%
  of Target Amount</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="54%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:54.38%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.5</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="42%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:42.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Less than 70.0%
  of Target Amount</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="54%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:54.38%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.0</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Nominal Bonus Amount</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The credit (%) earned against each of the PTI and ROIC
measures is first multiplied by the Modifier Factor and is then multiplied by a
participant&#146;s base salary to determine a preliminary bonus award amount derived
from each measure. The amounts from each measure are then added to establish a
participant&#146;s nominal bonus (NB) amount.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Personal Performance</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At FYE an overall rating of each participant&#146;s
Personal Performance (PP) will be determined by the appropriate
manager/executive. The rating shall be in the form of a number ranging between
0.00 and 2.00.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CEO Evaluation / Rating</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Shortly after FYE, the CEO in conjunction with the
Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors will develop an evaluation of
the consolidated results of overall company performance. This evaluation will
be in the form of a rating in the range of 0.00 to 1.50 and will typically
recognize common stock price performance, diluted earnings per share results as
well as consolidated net income improvement and the attainment of AAR&#146;s
strategic objectives.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="4" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-weight:bold;">The Actual Bonus Award Amount</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The actual bonus amount to be awarded a participant
shall be determined in accord with the following formula.</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr>
  <td width="60" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:45.0pt;">

  </td>
  <td width="20" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:15.0pt;">

  </td>

  </td>

  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">x</font></i></p>
  </td>
  <td width="63" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:47.6pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">CEO</font></i></p>
  </td>
  <td width="23" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:17.4pt;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">=</font></i></p>
  </td>
  <td width="187" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:140.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Actual Bonus Award</font></i></p>

  </td>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Overall</font></i></p>
  </td>
  <td width="23" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:17.4pt;">

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(NB $)&#160;&#160; x&#160;&#160; (PP Rating)&#160;&#160;
x&#160;&#160; (CEO Rating)&#160; =&#160; $
Bonus</font></i></b></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">4</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\fc\1944407558_D10466_1220686\15961-2-km.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jul 13 04:40 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A hypothetical example of a bonus award calculation is
presented in the attached Exhibit&nbsp;I.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Discretionary Awards</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors
may, upon the recommendation of senior executive management, <u>increase or
decrease</u> a participant&#146;s actual bonus award amount by up to 100% in certain
circumstances, taking into account a multitude of discretionary factors
affecting a particular time period or individual participant. Such
circumstances could include the effects of acquisitions, divestitures,
corporate stock buybacks or financing activities, foreign currency, significant
unplanned special projects or activities intended to enhance current year bonus
payments perhaps to the detriment of future periods (e.g., inadequate
expenditures that artificially increase short-term profits or unnecessary
year-end shipments that build sales only short-term, etc.), or an individual&#146;s
contribution or performance for such year. For certain participants, a
discretionary change to the actual bonus award may also recognize how well his
or her management team has been built and developed.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition, should there be unusual circumstances
occurring during the FY such that the above measures and/or bonus award amounts
do not adequately reflect extraordinary effort, the CEO may consider providing
a participant with a one-time, solely discretionary bonus award.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">MIP Administration</font></u></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MIP administration shall
be the responsibility of the Corporate Vice President &#151; Human Resources.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 2.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>New Participants</u></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">New employees who join the Company during the Plan
year may be authorized to participate in the MIP on a pro-rata basis with the
approval of the Chief Executive Officer and the Vice President &#151; Human
Resources.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 2.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Transfers and Promotions</u></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If a
participant is transferred or promoted during the Plan year causing an
adjustment in the assigned Target Bonus, such a participant&#146;s bonus will be
calculated on a pro-rata basis.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 2.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Retirement, Death or Disability</u></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 54.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A participant who
retires, dies, or becomes totally and permanently disabled (as that term is
defined in the AAR Retirement Plan) during the Plan year will be entitled to a
pro-rated bonus in accordance with Paragraph D.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">5</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\fc\1944407558_D10466_1220686\15961-2-km.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jul 13 04:40 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 2.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">D.&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Payment of Bonus</u></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bonuses will be paid as soon as possible after the
completion of the company&#146;s year-end audit. A participant does not have a
contractual right to receive a bonus. Rather, a participant becomes entitled to
receive a bonus award payment only after such individual payments, if any, have
been approved and authorized by the Compensation Committee of the Board.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 2.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Employment as a Condition Precedent</u></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No
bonus will be paid, except pursuant to the provisions of Paragraph C above,
unless a participant is an employee of the Company on the bonus payout date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 2.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>No Employment Contract</u></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Neither
the establishment of the MIP nor the authorization to be a participant in the
Plan will be construed as giving any participant the right to be retained in
the service of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 2.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">G.&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Modification of Goals</u></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Compensation
Committee of the Board from time to time during the Plan year, may modify the
MIP at the discretion of the Chief Executive Officer and the Committee, should
any part of the MIP cease to be a reasonable measure of desired performance. These
modifications shall be timely communicated to participants in writing.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><i><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Specific
Participant Goals</font></u></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The goals and target bonus percentages for each
eligible participant shall be communicated to each participant in a form,
approximating that shown in Exhibit&nbsp;II, attached.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">6</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\fc\1944407558_D10466_1220686\15961-2-km.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jul 13 04:40 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<h1 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h1>

<h1 align="right" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subsidiaries
required to be listed pursuant to Regulation S-K Item 601(b)(21).</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Also
does business under the names AAR Distribution, AAR Aircraft Services-Oklahoma,
AAR Aircraft Advisory and AAR Airframe Services-Roswell.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Also
does business under the names AAR Landing Gear Services, AAR Aircraft Component
Services, Mars Aircraft Radio and AAR Hermetic.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Also
does business under the names AAR Aircraft &amp; Turbine Center, AAR Allen
Aircraft, AAR Defense Systems &amp; Logistics, AAR Engine Sales &amp; Leasing
and AAR PMA Products.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Also
does business under the name AAR Power Services.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(6)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Also
does business under the name AAR Aircraft Services-Indianapolis.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(7)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Also
does business under the names AAR Aircraft Sales &amp; Leasing and AAR
Financial Services Corp.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(8)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Also
does business under the names AAR Distribution International, AAR Aircraft
Component Services, AAR Engine Group International, AAR Aircraft Group
International, AAR Manufacturing Group International and AAR Allen Group
International.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(9)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Also
does business under the names AAR Cargo Systems, AAR Mobility Systems, AAR Composites
and AAR ATICS.</p>

<html>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit 23.1</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consent of
Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Board of Directors<br>
AAR CORP.:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We consent to the incorporation by reference in
Registration Statement Nos. 333-122111, 333-112654, 33-19767,
333-102416, 333-81790, 333-54178, 333-95433, 333-71067,
333-44693, 333-38671, 33-26783, 33-38042, 33-43839,
33-58456, 33-56023, 33-57753, 333-15327, 333-22175,
333-26093, 333-00205, 002-89735 and 002-95635 on Form S-8
and in Registration Statement Nos. 333-133692, 333-114855 and 333-52853
on Form S-3 of AAR CORP. of our reports dated July 14, 2006 relating to
the consolidated balance sheets of AAR CORP. and subsidiaries as of May 31,
2006 and 2005, and the related consolidated statements of operations,
stockholders&#146; equity and cash flows for each of the years in the three-year
period ended May 31, 2006, management&#146;s assessment of the effectiveness of
internal control over financial reporting as of May 31, 2006 and the
effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting as of May 31, 2006,
which reports appear in the May 31, 2006 annual report on Form 10-K of
AAR CORP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ KPMG LLP</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Chicago, Illinois<br>
July 14, 2006</font></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.1
<SEQUENCE>8
<FILENAME>a06-15961_1ex31d1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-31
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;31.1<a name="Exhibit31_1_155843"></a></font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CERTIFICATION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I,
David P. Storch, Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of AAR CORP.
(the &#147;Registrant&#148;), certify that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>I
have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K of AAR CORP.;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a
material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information
included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the Registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this report;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing
and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e)&nbsp;and
15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15d-15(f)) for the
Registrant and have:</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to the Registrant, including its consolidated
subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly
during the period in which this report is being prepared;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control
over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the
preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with
generally accepted accounting principles;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Evaluated
the effectiveness of the Registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Disclosed
in this report any change in the Registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting that occurred during the Registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the
Registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has
materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the
Registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most
recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
Registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the Registrant&#146;s board of
directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of
internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
adversely affect the Registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and
report financial information; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 10.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who
have a significant role in the Registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting.</p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 10.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">DATE: July&nbsp;14,
2006</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CERTIFICATION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I,
Timothy J. Romenesko, Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of AAR CORP. (the
&#147;Registrant&#148;), certify that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>I
have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K of AAR CORP.;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a
material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information
included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the Registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this report;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing
and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e)&nbsp;and
15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15d-15(f)) for the
Registrant and have:</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to the Registrant, including its consolidated
subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly
during the period in which this report is being prepared;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control
over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the
preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with
generally accepted accounting principles;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Evaluated
the effectiveness of the Registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Disclosed
in this report any change in the Registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting that occurred during the Registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the
Registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has
materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the
Registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most
recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
Registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the Registrant&#146;s board of
directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of
internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
adversely affect the Registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and
report financial information; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 10.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who
have a significant role in the Registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting.</p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 10.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">DATE: July&nbsp;14,

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;32.1<a name="Exhibit32_1_161826"></a></font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CERTIFICATION
PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,<br>
AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO<br>
SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with
the AAR CORP. (the &#147;Company&#148;) Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the
period ending May&nbsp;31, 2006 as filed with the Securities and Exchange
Commission on the date hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, David&nbsp;P. Storch, Chief
Executive Officer of the Company, certify pursuant to 18&nbsp;U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350,
as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002,
that, to the best of my knowledge:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a)&nbsp;or 15(d)&nbsp;of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 18.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all
material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the
Company.</font></p>

<TYPE>EX-32.2

<FILENAME>a06-15961_1ex32d2.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-32
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;32.2<a name="Exhibit32_2_162303"></a></font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CERTIFICATION
PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,<br>
AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO<br>
SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with
the AAR CORP. (the &#147;Company&#148;) Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the
period ending May&nbsp;31, 2006 as filed with the Securities and Exchange
Commission on the date hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Timothy&nbsp;J. Romenesko,
Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify pursuant to 18&nbsp;U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350,
as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that,
to the best of my knowledge:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a)&nbsp;or 15(d)&nbsp;of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 18.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all
material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the
Company.</font></p>

<div align="center">
